headline: Tech Weekly podcast: 4chan founder Chris Poole
text: The anonymous online picture-based forum 4chan.org (warning: some content may offend) was set up in 2003 by the-then 15-year-old Chris Poole. Since its inception as an anime and manga discussion forum, 4chan has become a key player in online anonymity. In the first of two conversations dedicated to online identity and anonymity, Aleks Krotoski meets with Chris to discuss at length his perspective on this issue and explore why he has been dubbed the "anti-Zuckerberg".
